Question: Guizhou Fuding Rubber and plastic co., ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guizhou Fuding Rubber & Plastic Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Yoga Mat
- Mouse Pad
- Door Mat
- Therapy Accupressure Mats and Pillow for Relaxation and Pain Relief
- Yoga Mat 4PCS Set Home Gym Pilates Mat Ball Strap and Tension Rope Jump Rope Yoga Mat Set
- Joint Protection Thick Unti-Slip and Sound Proof Jump Rope Mat Small Yoga Mat
- Environmentally friendly, safe, and non-toxic natural rubber foam products
- Exported to North America, Europe, Middle East, Southeast Asia, Japan, Korea Australia, and some African countries
- Nearly 50 salespeople and 7 Alibaba international stores
- Products sold in more than 50 countries and regions around the world
- Partnerships with Disney, Marvel, Warner, Universal Pictures
- ISO9001, RoHS, Reach, SGS, EN71 and IC certifications
- More than 20 products technical patents
- Planning to attend landmark exhibitions or visit key customers in major world markets

- 出口到北美、欧洲、中东、东南亚、日本、韩国、澳大利亚和一些非洲国家
- 近50名销售人员和7家阿里巴巴国际店铺
